project_description: A wearable device that monitors heart rate, steps, and sleep patterns, providing real-time health insights via a mobile app.
High-quality wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, long battery life, and immersive sound experience.
RGB-backlit mechanical keyboard with customizable keys, high durability, and responsive switches for an enhanced gaming experience.
A centralized smart home hub that connects and controls all IoT devices with voice commands and automation features.
